Here is a list of every concrete visual element that the final image must contain:

*   The main title "1 Safety Instructions", translated into Japanese text.
*   An orange underline beneath the main title text.
*   The introductory note "Note: Before using this product, please carefully read the following important safety information.", translated into Japanese text.
*   Instruction text "1.This electric scooter can be used by one adult only. Never carry others.", translated into Japanese text.
*   Instruction text "2.Wear safety helmet and other protective equipment while using this product.", translated into Japanese text.
*   A light grey rounded rectangular background for the top-left image panel.
*   A red "prohibition" symbol (a circle with a diagonal line through it, over a crossed circle) in the top-left image panel.
*   A line drawing of two people on a single electric scooter, side view, within the top-left image panel.
*   A line drawing of one person carrying another on their back while on an electric scooter, front view, within the top-left image panel.
*   A light grey rounded rectangular background for the top-right image panel.
*   A red "approval" symbol (a checkmark within a circle) in the top-right image panel.
*   A line drawing of a person's head in profile wearing a safety helmet, within the top-right image panel.
*   A line drawing of a person's knee wearing a protective knee pad, within the top-right image panel.
*   Instruction text "3.Never ride this product in an unsafe or illegal place.", translated into Japanese text.
*   Instruction text "4.Please practice in an open area (not on lanes) first and use this product until you are skilled in operation.", translated into Japanese text.
*   A light grey rounded rectangular background for the bottom-left image panel.
*   A red "prohibition" symbol (a circle with a diagonal line through it, over a crossed circle) in the bottom-left image panel.
*   A line drawing of a "no scooter riding" sign (an electric scooter icon within a prohibition circle, mounted on a post) in the bottom-left image panel.
*   A line drawing of a person riding an electric scooter past the "no scooter riding" sign, in the bottom-left image panel.
*   Line drawings representing motion lines behind the moving scooter in the bottom-left image panel.
*   A light grey rounded rectangular background for the bottom-right image panel.
*   A red "prohibition" symbol (a circle with a diagonal line through it, over a crossed circle) in the bottom-right image panel.
*   A line drawing of a person riding an electric scooter on a road, front view, in the bottom-right image panel.
*   A line drawing of a car in the background on the road, in the bottom-right image panel.
*   A line drawing of a traffic cone on the road, in the bottom-right image panel.
*   Line drawings representing road lane markings (dashed lines) in the bottom-right image panel.
*   The page number "2" located at the bottom-left of the page.
